content.raw: Yeah I tried to get rid of it with no success and forgot to document it. The provider is created and immediately after that the image component tries to get the image for the first time, but for some reason it can't find the provider yet. I tried to force the application to process all events in between but that didn't seem to help. The next time the component asks for the provider, it works and the warning is not printed anymore. Let me know if you have an idea of what could be happening.
content.html: Yeah I tried to get rid of it with no success and forgot to document it. The provider is created and immediately after that the image component tries to get the image for the first time, but for some reason it can't find the provider yet. I tried to force the application to process all events in between but that didn't seem to help. The next time the component asks for the provider, it works and the warning is not printed anymore. Let me know if you have an idea of what could be happening.
